GK19srngt_su:2: agny-ākāraṃ kalayasi puraś cakravākīva candraṃ ST_2.11aa
GK19srngt_su:5: ajananir astu dṛśos tava kucayor abhava-niralaṃ bhavatu ST_1.51fa
GK19srngt_su:8: atyadbhutaṃ narādhipa tava kīrtir dhavalayanty api jaganti ST_3.43ca
GK19srngt_su:9: atha kila valal-līlālokaṃ sa eṣa tathekṣitaḥ ST_1.56ac
GK19srngt_su:15: animittaṃ yad vihasati niṣkāraṇam eva yat sakhīṃ vadati ST_1.56ca
GK19srngt_su:35: abhimata-mukhaṃ vīkṣāṃ cakre navāṅganayā tathā ST_1.50ac
GK19srngt_su:36: abhimukha-gate yasminn eva priye bahuśo vada- ST_1.56aa
GK19srngt_su:42: amuṃ dadhe'ṃśukam aham atra pādape ST_2.67fa
GK19srngt_su:43: ayam api bhavet sampraty api kṣayānala-saṃnibhaḥ ST_1.32bc
GK19srngt_su:47: avadhi-divasaḥ pūrṇaḥ sakhyo vimuñcata tat-kathāṃ ST_2.58ec
GK19srngt_su:61: asmākam asti na hi kaścid ihāvakāśas ST_1.41cc
GK19srngt_su:62: asmākaṃ tu tadīya-pāṇi-kamale'py unmocayaty aṃśukaṃ ST_1.43ac
GK19srngt_su:63: asmākaṃ sakhi vāsasī na rucire graiveyakaṃ nojjvalaṃ ST_1.25aa
GK19srngt_su:70: ājñāṃ kevalam eva manmatha-guror ādāya nūnaṃ mayā ST_1.ac
GK19srngt_su:78: ālīnāṃ pura eva nihnuti-paraḥ kopād raṇan-nūpuraṃ ST_1.45bc
GK19srngt_su:79: ālīnāṃ purato dadhāti śirasā pāda-prahārāṃs tato ST_1.28ac
GK19srngt_su:91: iti caṭu-śatair vāraṃ vāraṃ vapuḥ paritaḥ spṛśan ST_1.74ac
GK19srngt_su:94: iti nigadite kiñcid bhītyā vivartita-kandharā ST_1.37ac
GK19srngt_su:100: itthaṃ caṇḍi tathā tavaiṣa ruciraḥ kopa-kramo jṛmbhate ST_2.34ac
GK19srngt_su:101: itthaṃ tena nirīkṣitaṃ na ca mayāpy evaṃ samālokitas ST_2.12aa
GK19srngt_su:102: itthaṃ nātha tavāridhāmni śavarair ālokya citra-sthitiṃ ST_3.3bc
GK19srngt_su:107: itthaṃ sarva-rasāśrayaḥ paśupatir bhūyāt satāṃ bhūtaye ST_1.1d
GK19srngt_su:109: itthaṃ subhru visaṃsthulāpi viraha-vyāpād vimardād iyaṃ ST_2.58cc
GK19srngt_su:112: ity ādi ramyāḥ pravilokya vṛttīr ST_3.45a
GK19srngt_su:119: ity ālocya cirāya cāru ruci-mantrasyat-kuraṅgī-dṛśo ST_3.39ac
GK19srngt_su:120: ity ālocya mṛgīdṛśā karatale saṃsthāpya vaktrāmbujaṃ ST_1.75ac
GK19srngt_su:121: ity ukto'pi na nāma muñcati yadā pādāv ayaṃ durjano ST_1.28bc
GK19srngt_su:122: ity uktvā praṇataḥ priyaḥ kṣititalād utthāpya sānandayā ST_1.89ac
GK19srngt_su:123: ity uktvā sudṛśā kayāpi valita-grīvaṃ dṛśau sphārite ST_2.12ad
GK19srngt_su:127: induṃ nindati padma-kandala-dalais talpaṃ na vā manyate ST_2.9aa
GK19srngt_su:131: iyatīṃ subhagāvasthāṃ gato'si yasyāḥ kṛte smarātaṅkāt ST_2.60ca
GK19srngt_su:142: utpaśyāmi yad evam eva ca muhur dṛṣṭiṃ sakhī-saṃmukhīṃ ST_1.44ac
GK19srngt_su:161: ullaṅghyāḸ sakhī-vacaḥ samucitām utsṛjya lajjām alaṃ ST_1.aa
GK19srngt_su:169: etat kiṃ nanu karṇa-bhūṣaṇa-mayaṃ hāraḥ sukāñcī navā- ST_2.47aa
GK19srngt_su:173: etān apy adhunāsmi vajraghaṭitā nūnaṃ sahiṣye dhanān ST_2.57ad
GK19srngt_su:174: evaṃ nau surataṃ bhaviṣyati cirād adyeti sānandayā ST_1.76ac
GK19srngt_su:178: eṣāṃ prabandha-viṣayo vyavahāraḥ prāyaśo bhavet pracuraḥ ST_1.32a
GK19srngt_su:181: kakṣāntar-nakha-maṇḍanaṃ sakhi navaṃ pracchādyatāṃ vāsasā ST_3.39bd
GK19srngt_su:182: kaccāntāś ca śilīndhra-kandala-bhṛtaḥ soḍhāḥ kadambānilāḥ ST_2.57ab
GK19srngt_su:185: katham api yathā dṛṣṭā manye kṛtaṃ śruti-laṅghanam ST_1.56ad
GK19srngt_su:186: kathaṃcin no tṛptis taruṇimani manye mṛga-dṛśaḥ ST_1.35ad
GK19srngt_su:190: kadambākāreṇa priya iti samākhyāyi vapuṣā ST_2.67ad
GK19srngt_su:193: kandarpaṃ haratā hareṇa bhuvanaṃ niḥsāram etat kṛtam ST_2.60ad
GK19srngt_su:194: kandarpaḥ param eka eva vijayī yāte'pi kānte sthitaḥ ST_2.58bd
GK19srngt_su:198: kampaś cādhara-pallave viracitaḥ kāmaṃ kuraṅgīdṛśā ST_2.32ac
GK19srngt_su:207: karpūraṃ kirati prayāti na ratiṃ prāleya-dhārā-gṛhe ST_2.9ab
GK19srngt_su:219: kaścid guṇo bhavati yadyapi sampratīha ST_1.3b
GK19srngt_su:221: kasyāścit subhaga iti śrutaś ciraṃ yas taṃ ST_1.50ca
GK19srngt_su:223: kāntasyāpriya-kāriṇīti bhavatī taṃ vakti doṣābilaṃ ST_1.26ac
GK19srngt_su:225: kānte kiṃ kupitāsi kaḥ para-jane prāṇeśa kopo bhavet ST_1.89aa
GK19srngt_su:226: kānte tathā katham api prathitaṃ mṛgākṣyā ST_1.39da
GK19srngt_su:229: kāmaṃ karṇa-kaṭuḥ kuto'timadhuraḥ kekā-ravaḥ kekināṃ ST_2.57ba
GK19srngt_su:230: kāmaṃ na paśyati didṛkṣata eva bhūmnā ST_1.52aa
GK19srngt_su:238: kālo'nyaḥ khalu ko'pi so'mṛtamayo jāto viṣātmādhunā ST_1.41bc
GK19srngt_su:245: kāvye śubhe'pi racite khalu no khalebhyaḥ ST_1.3a
GK19srngt_su:254: kim aparam ataḥ kartavyaṃ nas tanāv api nādaraḥ ST_3.18ad
GK19srngt_su:255: kim aparam ito yuktāyuktair vinā hy amunā tava ST_1.32bb
GK19srngt_su:256: kim api lalitaiḥ snigdhaiḥ kiñcit kim apy atikuñcitaiḥ ST_1.50aa
GK19srngt_su:257: kim api valitaiḥ kandarpeṣūn hasadbhir ivekṣaṇaiḥ ST_1.50ab
GK19srngt_su:258: kim u mukhamadirecchuḥ kesaro no hṛdisthaḥ ST_1.39cb
GK19srngt_su:261: kiṃ candanair racayase nu mṛṇāla-śayyāṃ ST_2.2aa
GK19srngt_su:263: kiṃcid dhyāyati niścalā ca balavad romāñcitā kampate ST_2.13ab
GK19srngt_su:265: kiṃ tatra nāsti rajanī kiṃ vā candro na suṣṭhu-ruciḥ ST_2.58da
GK19srngt_su:266: kiṃ te kṛtyaṃ mayā dhūrta ST_3.50c
GK19srngt_su:267: kiṃ tv anye'pi janā vadanti subhago'py asyāḥ priyo nānyato ST_1.25ac
GK19srngt_su:268: kiṃ tv ekasya gṛhaṃ gatasya baḍavā-vahneḥ sadā tṛṣṇayā ST_3.43ac
GK19srngt_su:269: kiṃ ruddhaḥ priyayā kayācid athavā sakhyā tayodvejitaḥ ST_1.75aa
GK19srngt_su:270: kiṃ vā kāraṇa-gauravaṃ kim api yan nādyāgato vallabhaḥ ST_1.75ab
GK19srngt_su:271: kiṃ syād ittham aharniśaṃ sakhi mano dolāyate cintayā ST_1.26ad
GK19srngt_su:272: kuca-dvandvākrāntaṃ hṛdayam ahṛdaḥ kānna kurute ST_1.39ab
GK19srngt_su:273: kucau kumbhārambhau tad api cibukottambhana-rucī ST_1.35ab
GK19srngt_su:290: kṛtaṃ mithyā-jalpair virama viditaṃ kāmuka cirāt ST_1.45aa
GK19srngt_su:291: kṛtvāneka-vidhāṃ rasena surate keliṃ kathañcic cirā- ST_1.40aa
GK19srngt_su:293: kṛpāṃ tathāpi sujanārtham idaṃ yataḥ kiṃ ST_1.3c
GK19srngt_su:295: kṛṣṇe gate kusuma-sāyaka tat prabhāte ST_2.58ac
GK19srngt_su:303: kopāt kiñcid upānato'pi rabhasād ākṛṣya keśeṣv alaṃ ST_1.27ba
GK19srngt_su:304: kopo bhavet tava mukhaṃ tu nijaṃ kim etat ST_2.36ab
GK19srngt_su:305: ko'py anyo'sti gurur na cātinipuṇāḥ sakhyo'sya saṃbodhane ST_2.8ab
GK19srngt_su:306: ko'yaṃ kā vayam atra kiṃ nu surataṃ naiva smṛtir jāyate ST_1.43ad
GK19srngt_su:307: ko'yaṃ kāsmi rataṃ kiṃ vā ST_1.43c
GK19srngt_su:309: ko'yaṃ vimuñca kuru nātha vaco madīyam ST_2.67ea
GK19srngt_su:310: ko'yaṃ subhru paras tvam eva dayite dāso'smi kas te paraḥ ST_1.89ab
GK19srngt_su:312: kruddhāyāṃ mayi nātha te kadalikākāṇḍair alātāyitam ST_1.41bb
GK19srngt_su:317: klāntasyodara-pūraṇe'pi na saho yat tan manāṅ madhyamam ST_3.43ad
GK19srngt_su:322: gacchāmīti vadaty asāv api muhuḥ śaṅkākulā kevalaṃ ST_2.31ac
GK19srngt_su:323: gaṇḍollāsa-vibhāvitaḥ paśupater hāsodgamaḥ pātu vaḥ ST_3.2ad
GK19srngt_su:324: gataṃ karṇābhyarṇe prasarati tathāpy akṣi-yugalaṃ ST_1.35aa
GK19srngt_su:325: gatir mandībhūtā harati gamanaṃ manmathavatā- ST_1.39ac
GK19srngt_su:329: garvād vyasana-tyāgād vipriya-karaṇāc ca niṣṭhurālāpāt ST_2.56a
GK19srngt_su:341: gaurī-locana-lobhanāya subhago veṣo varasyeti me ST_3.2ac
GK19srngt_su:345: cakṣur dikṣu niveśitaṃ sa-karuṇaṃ sakhyā samaṃ jalpitam ST_1.79ab
GK19srngt_su:349: cambaty ambaram indau tava tena vinā ratiḥ kīdṛk ST_1.51eb
GK19srngt_su:359: cetaś citram aho tathāpi ramate saṃketake kāminām ST_2.31ad
GK19srngt_su:360: cetaś cumbita-kāla-kūṭam iva me kasmād idaṃ muhyati ST_2.10ad
GK19srngt_su:370: jalpantyā śravaṇotpalena sukṛtī kaścid rahas tāḍyate ST_1.27bd
GK19srngt_su:371: jalpantyāḥ paruṣaṃ ruṣā mama balāc cumbaty asāv ānanaṃ ST_1.28aa
GK19srngt_su:372: jātā subhru manoramā tava daśā kasmād akasmād iyam ST_1.39bd
GK19srngt_su:374: jāto'yaṃ praṇatīr apāsya sutarām etad-didṛkṣur yathā ST_2.34ad
GK19srngt_su:379: jīrṇaṃ tārṇa-kuṭīrakaṃ nivasanaṃ talpīkṛtaṃ sthaṇḍile ST_2.31aa
GK19srngt_su:386: jñeyaḥ pūrvānurāgo'yam aprāptau ca daśā yathā ST_2.2b
GK19srngt_su:392: tac chaṅke tava paṅkajākṣi balavān ko'py aprasādo mayi ST_1.44ad
GK19srngt_su:393: tac chūnyaṃ suciraṃ niṣevya sudṛśā paścāc ca bhagnāśayā ST_1.78ab
GK19srngt_su:398: tat kiṃ yad viparītam atra na kṛtaṃ tasyā viyogena me ST_2.57bd
GK19srngt_su:399: tat-kūjitaṃ kim api yena tadīya-talpaṃ ST_1.22cc
GK19srngt_su:401: tat tat kiṃcid anuṣṭhitaṃ mṛgadṛśā no yatra vācāṃ gatiḥ ST_1.79ad
GK19srngt_su:407: tat satyaṃ kathayāli kiṃ sa subhagaḥ kupyen na mahyaṃ gata ST_2.12ac
GK19srngt_su:427: tad bāḍhaṃ kriyate yad asya rucitaṃ cāṭūccakais tanyate ST_2.67cb
GK19srngt_su:428: tad bhūyo'pi kadā saroruha-dṛśaḥ paśyāmi tasyā mukham ST_2.2bd
GK19srngt_su:429: tad-vaktraṃ hasitendu-maṇḍalam iti sphāraṃ tad-ālokitaṃ ST_2.10aa
GK19srngt_su:434: tanv-aṅgyāḥ kathitaḥ smareṇa guruṇā ko'py eṣa kaṣṭa-kramaḥ ST_2.14ad
GK19srngt_su:435: tanvī mānam upekṣayaiva śanakair dhūrtena saṃmocitā ST_2.47ad
GK19srngt_su:443: tarat-tāraṃ cakṣuḥ kṣapayati munīnām api dṛśaḥ ST_1.39aa
GK19srngt_su:445: tava kumudinīva vāñchati nṛ-candra bālā kara-spṛśam ST_1.53ab
GK19srngt_su:446: tava tu hṛdaye śīte'py evaṃ sadaiva sukhāptaye ST_2.67dc
GK19srngt_su:460: tasyāḥ kiñcit subhaga tad abhūt tānavaṃ tvad-viyoge ST_1.60ac
GK19srngt_su:468: tilakam alike kurvan gaṇḍād udasyati kuntalān ST_1.74ab
GK19srngt_su:469: tila-mātrakam apy abhūn nahi śraveṇendīvara-locanānantaram ST_1.50bb
GK19srngt_su:470: tiṣṭhaty akhaṇḍam iha kāvya-mayaṃ śarīram ST_1.2d
GK19srngt_su:473: tulyam etad itaraiḥ samaṃ satām ST_3.44ab
GK19srngt_su:476: tenoktaṃ subhagena tatra na mayā dattaṃ vaco mandayā ST_2.12ab
GK19srngt_su:477: teṣām apy upari sphuranti matayaḥ kasyāpi puṇyātmanaḥ ST_1.4d
GK19srngt_su:479: tyaktvā guñja-phalāni mauktikamayī bhūṣā staneṣv āhitā ST_3.3ba
GK19srngt_su:480: tyavanata-mukhaṃ tūṣṇīm eva sthitaṃ mṛga-netrayā ST_1.56ab
GK19srngt_su:487: tripura-vadhād eva gatām ullāsam umāṃ samasta-deva-natām ST_3.57da
GK19srngt_su:494: tvayi niyatam aśoke yujyate pādaghātaḥ ST_1.39cc
GK19srngt_su:502: dayita manorama ramaṇī-jīvita ity ādi nāma syāt ST_2.54b
GK19srngt_su:503: dayita-vadanāloke mandaṃ yathā ca calaty asau ST_2.7bc
GK19srngt_su:504: dayitaṃ vilokya tad iyaṃ śaṃsati tad adhīnam ātmānam ST_1.56cb
GK19srngt_su:510: dāstāṃ rantum aho nirīkṣitum api preyān na sambhāvitaḥ ST_1.59ad
GK19srngt_su:511: dihaiva te priya viditā kṛtārthatā ST_1.41ad
GK19srngt_su:514: dīrghe niḥśvasitaṃ ciraṃ ca ruditaṃ kṣiptāś ca puṣpa-srajaḥ ST_1.75ad
GK19srngt_su:518: durvāra-smarayā tayā sahacarī gāḍhaṃ samāliṅgitā ST_1.56bd
GK19srngt_su:520: duṣprāpaḥ sa tu ko'pi kovida-patir yad vāg-rasa-grāhiṇāṃ ST_1.7c
GK19srngt_su:524: dūtī-janasya parato laghur api doṣo gurūyate prāyaḥ ST_2.41a
GK19srngt_su:525: dūrāt kandalitair hṛdi pravitataiḥ kaṇṭhe luṭhadbhir haṭhā ST_1.32ca
GK19srngt_su:527: dūrād eva vilokayety abhimate tad vaktra-dattekṣaṇaṃ ST_1.56bc
GK19srngt_su:528: dṛṣṭaṃ ketaka-dhūli-dhūsaram idaṃ vyoma kramād vīkṣitāḥ ST_2.57aa
GK19srngt_su:529: dṛṣṭir niścalatārakādhara-dalaṃ śvāsaiḥ kṛtaṃ dhūṣaraṃ ST_2.15aa
GK19srngt_su:530: dṛṣṭiṃ niḥkṣipatīti viśvam iyatā manyāmahe duḥkhitam ST_1.25ad
GK19srngt_su:532: dṛṣṭiḥ snihyati nirbharaṃ priyatame vaidagdhya-bhājo giraḥ ST_1.39ba
GK19srngt_su:535: dṛṣṭvā darpaṇa-maṇḍale nija-mukhaṃ bhūṣāṃ manohāriṇīṃ ST_1.76aa
GK19srngt_su:538: devīvānimiṣekṣaṇā vilikhati kṣoṇīṃ śvasity uccakaiḥ ST_2.13aa
GK19srngt_su:540: deśe kāle ca bhaṅgyā ca ST_1.51c
GK19srngt_su:545: dautsukyaṃ pravilokya mohana-vidhau cāturyam ālokya ca ST_2.67bb
GK19srngt_su:547: dgārāvartibhir āpatadbhir abhitaḥ siktaś ca netrāmbubhiḥ ST_1.22bb
GK19srngt_su:550: draṣṭuṃ vaktuṃ ca no kanyā ST_1.52a
GK19srngt_su:551: dromāñcārcitayā śarīra-latayā saṃsūcya kopāt kila ST_1.51cb
GK19srngt_su:560: dhatte muñca ruṣaṃ mamātra dayite leśo'pi nāsty āgasaḥ ST_2.35ad
GK19srngt_su:562: dhanam aharahar dattaṃ svīyaṃ yathārthitam arthine ST_3.18aa
GK19srngt_su:565: dhanyasya lagati kaṇṭhe mugdha-śiśur dhūli-dhūsaritaḥ ST_3.12ab
GK19srngt_su:566: dhanyās tāḥ sakhi yoṣitaḥ priyatame sarvāṅga-lagne'pi yāḥ ST_1.43aa
GK19srngt_su:569: dhārāpātasamudbhavā na ca matā pīḍā tad-āliṅganaṃ ST_1.80ac
GK19srngt_su:570: dhik tvām dhūrta gata-trapa praṇayinī saiva tvayārādhyatā ST_1.28ba
GK19srngt_su:571: dhik tvāṃ dhūrta viniryad-aśrur abalā mohaṃ rudantī gatā ST_1.41bd
GK19srngt_su:578: nanu vadati tad adya preyasā saṃgamaṃ te ST_2.67gd
GK19srngt_su:579: na madhyasthaṃ cetaḥ praguṇa-ramaṇīyaṃ na ca dṛḍham ST_1.35bd
GK19srngt_su:581: na mugdhe pretyetuṃ prabhavati gataḥ kāla-hariṇaḥ ST_1.32ad
GK19srngt_su:583: na yācitaḥ kiṃcid apy adhikam ST_3.10bd
GK19srngt_su:587: na vaktuṃ tanvaṅgyā śakitam atha coddāma-vidalat- ST_2.67ac
GK19srngt_su:591: na vetti ca rasād yathā ST_1.43d
GK19srngt_su:593: nāgacchaty ucite'pi vāsaka-vidhau kānte samudvignayā ST_1.79ac
GK19srngt_su:606: nāyaṃ garji-ravo gabhīra-paruṣaṃ tūryaṃ tadīyaṃ tv idaṃ ST_3.41ba
GK19srngt_su:615: nitamba-prāg-bhāro gurur api gurutvaṃ mṛgayate ST_1.35ac
GK19srngt_su:635: nivṛtya kiṃ kim idam iti bruvāṇayā ST_2.49ac
GK19srngt_su:636: niśamayya bahir manoharaṃ svaram aikṣiṣṭa tathāparā yā ST_1.50ba
GK19srngt_su:645: niḥśvāsaiḥ saha sāmprataṃ sakhi gatā vṛddhiṃ dhruvaṃ rātrayaḥ ST_2.58ba
GK19srngt_su:647: nītvā mohana-mandiraṃ dayitayā hāreṇa bahvā dṛḍham ST_1.27bb
GK19srngt_su:648: nīrandhraṃ timiraṃ kiranti salilaṃ garjanta ete ghanāḥ ST_2.31ab
GK19srngt_su:649: nīrandhraṃ parirabhyate priyatamo bhūyastarāṃ cumbyate ST_2.67ca
GK19srngt_su:653: nūnaṃ te jalajaiṣiṇāyam alinā dṛṣṭo na bhartādharaḥ ST_3.3ab
GK19srngt_su:658: naite bhīma-bhujaṅga-bhoga-rucayo meghā ime tad-rajāḥ ST_3.41bb
GK19srngt_su:661: no garjir gaṇitā bhṛśaṃ śruti-mukhaṃ tad-vāci saṃcintya ca ST_1.80ab
GK19srngt_su:662: no jānatī nava-vadhū rudatī paraṃ sā ST_1.38ab
GK19srngt_su:663: no jāne kim ayaṃ priye prakaṭitaḥ kopo'bhilāṣo'thavā ST_2.32ad
GK19srngt_su:664: no jāne sakhi sāmprataṃ praṇayien kupyāmi tasmai katham ST_1.28ad
GK19srngt_su:665: no bhītaṃ taḍito dṛśā jalamucā tad-darśanākāṅkṣayā ST_1.80aa
GK19srngt_su:666: no vaktrā gatir uddhataṃ na hasitaṃ naivāsti kaścin madaḥ ST_1.25ab
GK19srngt_su:668: nnetrāmbhobhiś cham iti patitaiḥ sicyate ca stanāntaḥ ST_1.60ab
GK19srngt_su:669: nbhrū-bhedo na kṛto manāg api muhur yat-khaṇḍyamāne'dhare ST_1.44bb
GK19srngt_su:671: nribhrāntaṃ guruṇā punaḥ śata-guṇaṃ puṣpeṣuṇā kāritā ST_2.67cd
GK19srngt_su:672: pañcatvam āśu nanu yāsyati sā varākī ST_2.67ed
GK19srngt_su:682: pāṇau kaṅkaṇam utphaṇaḥ phaṇipatir netraṃ jvalat-pāvakaṃ ST_3.2aa
GK19srngt_su:686: pādāntaḥ-praṇate priye prakaṭayaty antaḥ prasādaṃ priyā ST_1.90ac
GK19srngt_su:687: pāpasyāsya phalaṃ tad etad adhunā yac candanendu-dyuti- ST_1.77ac
GK19srngt_su:688: pāpena yena gamiteti daśām amuṣmin ST_2.60dc
GK19srngt_su:690: pāśo vipāśita upāhita eṣa sāndraḥ ST_2.60da
GK19srngt_su:696: puṇya-strīva kalākalāpa-kuśalā cetāṃsi hartuṃ kṣamā ST_1.7d
GK19srngt_su:697: punar iha yuvāṃ satyaṃ śiṣṭaṃ tad atra kṛtāgasi ST_1.27ab
GK19srngt_su:700: punaś ca tās tridhā sarvā ST_1.88a
GK19srngt_su:710: prakaṭaya śaśinn āśāḥ kāmaṃ manoja samullasa ST_2.58eb
GK19srngt_su:716: prajvalitojjvala-dīpaṃ rati-gṛham indūjjvalaṃ ca saudhatalam ST_2.38a
GK19srngt_su:718: praṇayini jane rāgodrikte ratir vihitā ciraṃ ST_3.18ac
GK19srngt_su:719: praṇayini punar yuktaṃ rantuṃ na veti batāvayo- ST_1.27ac
GK19srngt_su:720: praṇayini bhṛśaṃ tasmin mānaṃ manasvini mā kṛthāḥ ST_1.32ba
GK19srngt_su:724: pratyaṅgaṃ prati karma narma-parayā kṛtvādhirūḍhaṃ smarā- ST_2.67ba
GK19srngt_su:729: pratyutthānam idaṃ svahasta-nihitaṃ yad-bhinnam apy āsanam ST_1.44ab
GK19srngt_su:730: pratyekam udāhṛtas tathāpi kāścin nigadyante ST_1.32b
GK19srngt_su:735: prabhāpi tāpāya babhūva yeṣv alam ST_3.39cb
GK19srngt_su:741: praviśati yathā gehe'kasmād bahiś ca viceṣṭate ST_2.7ba
GK19srngt_su:743: prasara śiśirāmodaṃ kaundaṃ samīra samīraya ST_2.58ea
GK19srngt_su:745: prāgalbhyaṃ prathayanti mohana-vidhāv ālambya dhairyaṃ mahat ST_1.43ab
GK19srngt_su:746: prāṇān dhatse katham api balād gacchataḥ śalya-tulyāṃ- ST_2.11ac
GK19srngt_su:747: prāṇāśā tanutām upaiti ca muhur nūnaṃ tanu-spardhayā ST_2.58bc
GK19srngt_su:748: prāṇeśa truṭitaṃ payodhara-taṭe hāraṃ punar yojaya ST_1.42cb
GK19srngt_su:752: prāptaṃ vāsara-candra-bimba-padavīṃ vaktraṃ vinaṣṭā smṛtiḥ ST_2.15ab
GK19srngt_su:760: priyam iti parihāsāt peśalaṃ kācid ūce ST_1.39cd
GK19srngt_su:764: priyaṃ pāda-prānta-praṇatam adhunā mānaya bhṛśaṃ ST_1.32ac
GK19srngt_su:768: priyāṃ tām evoccair abhisara yadīyair nakha-padaiḥ ST_1.45ab
GK19srngt_su:769: prītau bhartari sudṛśām aprītau punar amūni śaṭha-dhṛṣṭau ST_2.55a
GK19srngt_su:771: preyān ko'py aparo'yam atra sukṛtī dṛṣṭe'pi yasmin vapuḥ ST_1.51ac
GK19srngt_su:777: pluṣṭāḥ spaṣṭmaneka-ratna-nivahā nālaṃ rateḥ kevalaṃ ST_2.60ac
GK19srngt_su:778: baddhā kācid iyaṃ tvayādya tilakaḥ ślāghyaḥ priye kalpitaḥ ST_2.47ab
GK19srngt_su:780: badhnantyā na gataṃ sthitaṃ na ca galad-vāso na vā saṃvṛtam ST_2.8ad
GK19srngt_su:781: bandhūkaṃ ca tad etad āli vidalad yat tena sīmantitaṃ ST_1.42ac
GK19srngt_su:788: bāṇāvaliṃ kathaya kutra vimokṣyasi tvam ST_2.58ad
GK19srngt_su:791: bālā rasāntaram idaṃ lalitaṃ bibharti ST_1.52ad
GK19srngt_su:792: bālo dustyaja eka eva ca śiśuḥ kaṣṭaṃ kṛtaṃ vedhasā ST_3.5ac
GK19srngt_su:794: bāspārdrīkṛta-locanaiḥ sphuṭa-ravaṃ dāraiḥ samaṃ hasyate ST_3.3bd
GK19srngt_su:797: bimboṣṭhaḥ sphurati prayāti paṭutāṃ gaṇḍa-sthale śoṇimā ST_2.34aa
GK19srngt_su:801: bībhatso'sthibhir utphaṇī ca bhaya-kṛn mūrtyādbhutas tuṅgayā ST_1.1b
GK19srngt_su:809: bhartā saṃgara eva mṛtyu-vasatiṃ prāptaḥ samaṃ bandhubhir ST_3.5aa
GK19srngt_su:825: bhītiḥ saiva tad eva narma-madhuraṃ pūrvānurāgocitam ST_1.26ab
GK19srngt_su:828: bhūmāv akṣaramālikeva likhitā dīrghaṃ rudatyā śanaiḥ ST_1.78ad
GK19srngt_su:829: bhūyo drakṣyasi tāṃ śaṭheti dayitaṃ saṃtarjya saṃtarjya ca ST_1.45bb
GK19srngt_su:830: bhūyo yāsyasi tad-gṛhān iti muhuḥ kaṇṭhāruddhākṣaraṃ ST_1.27bc
GK19srngt_su:839: mad-vakṣasy avalambya kiṃcid adhunā tad vismṛtaṃ vajriṇā ST_3.10cc
GK19srngt_su:858: manye'syāḥ kusumāyudhaḥ sa-śibiraḥ pratyaṅgam āvāsitaḥ ST_2.15ad
GK19srngt_su:859: manyau kṛte prathamam eva vikāram anyaṃ ST_1.38aa
GK19srngt_su:860: mama sahacarī sā niḥsnehā manāg api na sthitā ST_2.67dd
GK19srngt_su:862: mayā kiṃ te kṛtyaṃ dhruvam akuṭilācāra-parayā ST_1.45ad
GK19srngt_su:863: mayā ko'yaṃ mugdhe kathaya likhitaḥ satvara-sakhī- ST_2.67aa
GK19srngt_su:867: maryādā-niratas tvam eva jaladhe brūte'tra ko'nyādṛśam ST_3.43ab
GK19srngt_su:869: maho tanvyās tulyaṃ taruṇimani sarvaṃ vijayate ST_1.39ad
GK19srngt_su:871: mātaṅgaiḥ stana-maṇḍalaṃ bhuja-yugollāso mṛṇālair api ST_2.60bb
GK19srngt_su:876: māninyā kathito'nukūla-vidhinā tenaiva manyur mahān ST_1.44bd
GK19srngt_su:878: māno manasvinīnām atisukhasādhyo bhaved bhūmnā ST_2.40b
GK19srngt_su:881: mā mā mamāli kuru komala-tāla-vṛntam ST_2.2ab
GK19srngt_su:882: mā māṃ vallabha saṃspṛśeti sahasā śūnyaṃ vadantī muhuḥ ST_1.51cc
GK19srngt_su:883: mām eva tāḍaya nitambini yady akasmāt ST_2.36aa
GK19srngt_su:888: mithyāvāda-vicakṣaṇaḥ kim aparaṃ kuryāṃ vayasye tadā ST_1.28bd
GK19srngt_su:898: mugdhe tvaṃ subhage na vetsi madana-vyāpāram adyāpi taṃ ST_3.3aa
GK19srngt_su:900: mudam agād adhikāṃ suaratād api ST_1.35cd
GK19srngt_su:901: mudhā santāpena glapayasi kim aṅgaṃ smara-bhuvā ST_1.32ab
GK19srngt_su:903: mūrcchāṃ harāmi sā tava gata-puṇyā nayana-salilena ST_2.60cb
GK19srngt_su:905: mṛga-dṛśi tathaitasyāṃ manye smareṇa kṛtaṃ padam ST_2.7bd
GK19srngt_su:910: mṛd-gātyāśu karaṃ kareṇa bahuśaḥ santāḍyamāno'pi san ST_1.28ab
GK19srngt_su:911: meghāś cāmṛta-dhāriṇo'pi vihitāḥ prāyo viṣa-syandinaḥ ST_2.57bb
GK19srngt_su:912: mthyālambita-sauṣṭhavena kim ataḥ kopena kāntaṃ prati ST_1.32cd
GK19srngt_su:917: yat khidyate tanur iyaṃ ca tad eṣa doṣaḥ ST_1.53bc
GK19srngt_su:918: yat tat ko'pi yuvā dhruvaṃ smara-suhṛc-cetasy amuṣāḥ sthitaḥ ST_2.9ad
GK19srngt_su:920: yat pāṇir na nivārito nivasana-granthiṃ saumudgranthaya- ST_1.44ba
GK19srngt_su:921: yat-pāda-praṇataḥ priyaḥ paruṣayā vācā sa nirvārito ST_1.77aa
GK19srngt_su:923: yatra sveda-lavair alaṃ vlulitair vyālupyate candanaṃ ST_1.42ba
GK19srngt_su:925: yatrāyānty acireṇa sarva-viṣayāḥ kāmaṃ tad-ekāgratāṃ ST_1.42bc
GK19srngt_su:929: yat-sakhyā na kṛtaṃ vaco jaḍatayā yan-manyur eko dhṛtaḥ ST_1.77ab
GK19srngt_su:930: yat saṅketa-gṛhaṃ priyeṇa kathitaṃ sampreṣya dūtīṃ svayaṃ ST_1.78aa
GK19srngt_su:931: yat samparkān na yāty eva ST_3.53c
GK19srngt_su:932: yat saṃsicya sudhā-rasair iva rater āsthāna-bhūmīkṛtaṃ ST_2.2bc
GK19srngt_su:933: yat sārair iva paṅkajasya ghaṭitaṃ yac candra-garbhād iva ST_2.2ba
GK19srngt_su:934: yathā dṛṣṭis tiryak patati sahasā saṅkucati ca ST_1.35bb
GK19srngt_su:940: yadā rāgo guruḥ sā ca ST_2.28a
GK19srngt_su:943: yadi dṛśyate na sa yuvā nirbharam āliṅgyate no vā ST_1.51fb
GK19srngt_su:946: yad vācaḥ pracuropacāra-caturā yat sādaraṃ dūrataḥ ST_1.44aa
GK19srngt_su:947: yan niḥśaṅkam ivārpitaṃ vapur aho patyuḥ samāliṅgane ST_1.44bc
GK19srngt_su:954: yasyāḥ pāda-talāhatiṃ tava hṛdi vyākhyāty asau yāvakaḥ ST_1.28bb
GK19srngt_su:955: yaḥ prāṇāpahatiḥ kṛtā mama pituḥ kṣudrair yudhi kṣatriyai ST_3.7aa
GK19srngt_su:958: yātas tiryag amū dṛśau ca balavad bhrū-yugmaam udbhrāmyati ST_2.34ab
GK19srngt_su:963: yā svīyā tāṃ prati prema ST_1.49c
GK19srngt_su:965: yuddhaṃ yady avalambate sa tu punaḥ sajjo'smy ahaṃ rāvaṇaḥ ST_3.10cd
GK19srngt_su:966: yuddhaṃ siddha-vadhū-gṛhīta-subhaṭaṃ jātaṃ tadā durdharam ST_3.41ad
GK19srngt_su:967: yuvā parāṃ nibhṛtam acumbad aṅganām ST_1.48ad
GK19srngt_su:968: yuvām alaṃ nibhṛtam ihaiva tiṣṭhatām ST_2.67fb
GK19srngt_su:970: yūnāṃ kāmam iyaṃ dunoti ca mano vaidhavya-bhāvād vadhūḥ ST_3.5ab
GK19srngt_su:971: yena sakhi vallabhām api na smarati sa māṃ videśa-ruciḥ ST_2.58db
GK19srngt_su:974: yair niḥsīma-sarasvatī-vilasitaṃ dvitraiḥ padaiḥ saṃhṛtaṃ ST_1.4c
GK19srngt_su:975: yaiḥ saṃsāra-samudra-pāta-vidhur eṣv anyeṣu potayitam ST_1.4b
GK19srngt_su:980: raktān karoti suhṛdo malinayati ca vairi-vadanāni ST_3.43cb
GK19srngt_su:985: ratir hāsaś ca śokaś ca ST_1.10a
GK19srngt_su:988: ramayati sutarāṃ tac-cittam antar navoḍhā ST_1.36ad
GK19srngt_su:1000: rāgaḥ syāt kiṃ nu sarvathā ST_1.65b
GK19srngt_su:1003: rāmo'haṃ ramaṇīr vihāya balavan niḥśeṣam eṣāṃ haṭhāt ST_3.7ab
GK19srngt_su:1004: ruṇadhmy ahaṃ tad iti nimīya locane ST_1.48ab
GK19srngt_su:1006: rodity aṅga-gatāṃ vilokya suciraṃ vīṇām api vyāpṛtā ST_2.13ac
GK19srngt_su:1013: raudro dakṣa-vimardane ca hasakṛn nagnaḥ praśāntaś cirād ST_1.1c
GK19srngt_su:1014: rdhruvam upagate karṇau praṣṭuṃ kuraṅga-dṛśau dṛśau ST_1.27ad
GK19srngt_su:1015: rviśrāntaṃ kuta eva lola-nayane kiṃ lohite locane ST_2.35ab
GK19srngt_su:1017: lakṣmyās tvaṃ janako nidhiś ca payasāṃ niḥśeṣa-ratnākaro ST_3.43aa
GK19srngt_su:1025: likhati kucayoḥ patraṃ kaṇṭhe niyojayati srajaṃ ST_1.74aa
GK19srngt_su:1028: lobhād atipravāsāt strīṇāṃ dveṣyaḥ priyo bhavati ST_2.56b
GK19srngt_su:1029: vaktraṃ candramasā dṛśau mṛga-gaṇaiḥ keśāḥ kalāpi-vrajair ST_2.60ba
GK19srngt_su:1033: vakṣaḥ saṃvriyate punaḥ punar idaṃ bhārālasaṃ gamyate ST_1.39bc
GK19srngt_su:1035: vacaḥ śrutvety uccair vinihita-dṛśā citra-phalake ST_2.67ab
GK19srngt_su:1037: vadati ca yathā sakhyā sārdhaṃ sahāsam ihotsukā ST_2.7bb
GK19srngt_su:1038: vadati ca yad alakṣyaṃ kiñcid uktāpi bhūyo ST_1.36ac
GK19srngt_su:1039: vadana-kamale bhartrā bālā ciraṃ paricumbitā ST_1.37ad
GK19srngt_su:1043: valati ca śayanīye kampate ca prakāmam ST_1.36ab
GK19srngt_su:1048: vācas tāś ca vidagdha-bhāva-caturāḥ sphārībhavan manmathā ST_1.22dc
GK19srngt_su:1050: vāco vāgmini kiṃ tavādya paruṣāḥ subhru bhruvor vibhramai- ST_2.35aa
GK19srngt_su:1053: vāñchantyā dayitābhisāraṇa-vidhau tanvyā paraṃ tat-param ST_1.80ad
GK19srngt_su:1056: vikasati kairava-nikare sarati ca sarasī-samīraṇo sutanu ST_1.51ea
GK19srngt_su:1074: vimuñcāmuṃ mānaṃ saphalaya vacaḥ sādhu suhṛdāṃ ST_1.32aa
GK19srngt_su:1075: vimṛja dhehi dhṛtiṃ mama medasā ST_3.10ab
GK19srngt_su:1078: viraha-vidhuro nāsyāḥ pārśvaṃ vimuñcati vallabhaḥ ST_1.74ad
GK19srngt_su:1082: vilāsaiś ca prāptaṃ tava hṛdi padaṃ raga-bahulair ST_1.45ac
GK19srngt_su:1104: veśyānāṃ dhṛti-dhāma puṣpa-dhanuṣaḥ prāpnoti dhanyo ratam ST_1.68ad
GK19srngt_su:1123: vyāyāṃ cita-kañcukaṃ mṛga-dṛśas tasyās tad-ālokitam ST_1.22db
GK19srngt_su:1133: śamaya dīpam iyaṃ samayā sakhī ST_1.35cb
GK19srngt_su:1138: śibir ahaṃ bhavatā vidito na kiṃ ST_3.10ac
GK19srngt_su:1141: śṛṅgāra-tilaka-vidhinā punar api rudraḥ prasādayati ST_3.57db
GK19srngt_su:1151: śṛṅgārī girijānane sakaruṇo ratyāṃ pravīraḥ smare ST_1.1a
GK19srngt_su:1168: śvāsaiḥ kevalam eva khedita-tanur dhyāyaty asau bālikā ST_2.9ac
GK19srngt_su:1179: sakhyas tat-surataṃ bhaṇāmi rataye śeṣā tu loka-sthitiḥ ST_1.42bd
GK19srngt_su:1180: sakhyaṃ tvayā vapur idaṃ gamitaṃ varākyāḥ ST_2.58ab
GK19srngt_su:1181: sakhyaḥ saṃvṛṇutāśru muñcata bhayaṃ kasmān mudevākulā ST_2.57ac
GK19srngt_su:1184: sakhyā no hasitā sacintam asakṛt saṃśocitā pratyuta ST_1.51cd
GK19srngt_su:1185: sakhyā mugdha-vadhūr iyaṃ rati-vidhau yatnena saṃśikṣitā ST_2.67cc
GK19srngt_su:1187: sakhyeva sthira-śobhayā dṛḍhataraṃ pratyaṅgam āliṅgitā ST_2.58cd
GK19srngt_su:1188: sakhyaivaṃ hasitaṃ vadhūṃ prati tathā sānandam āvirbhavad- ST_3.3ac
GK19srngt_su:1199: sat-toraṇaṃ hṛdi viśaty aparā vyudāse ST_1.57ad
GK19srngt_su:1200: satyaṃ durlabha eṣa vallabhatamo rāgo mamāsmin punaḥ ST_2.8aa
GK19srngt_su:1201: satyaṃ santi gṛhe gṛhe priyatamā yeṣāṃ bhujāliṅgana- ST_1.51aa
GK19srngt_su:1202: satyaṃ santi gṛhe gṛhe sukavayo yeṣāṃ vacaś cāturī ST_1.7a
GK19srngt_su:1206: sadyo yāvaka-maṇḍanaṃ na racitaṃ pāde kuraṅgī-dṛśā ST_2.67bc
GK19srngt_su:1209: santaptaḥ smra-saṃniveśa-vivaśaiḥ śvāsair muhuḥ pañcamo- ST_1.22ba
GK19srngt_su:1220: saphalaṃ khalu yadi bhavet so'tra ST_1.51dd
GK19srngt_su:1230: sampraty uddhata-vahni-vāri-viṣamaṃ manye vrataṃ sevate ST_1.22bd
GK19srngt_su:1238: sarvasvam etās tad aho smarasya ST_1.69d
GK19srngt_su:1239: sarvāṅgaṃ caṭukārako'py abalayā saṅketake kautukā- ST_1.59ac
GK19srngt_su:1242: sarvair niṣkaruṇair hṛtā dhruvam aho daivena kiṃcin na me ST_2.60bd
GK19srngt_su:1250: saṃcintyeti mṛgīdṛśā priyatame dṛṣṭe ślathāṃ mekhalāṃ ST_2.8ac
GK19srngt_su:1259: sākṣīdaṃ mada-bāndhavasya nibhṛtaṃ kasyāpi līlā-nidheḥ ST_3.39bc
GK19srngt_su:1267: sānanda-pramadā-kaṭākṣa-viśikhair yeṣāṃ na bhinnaṃ mano ST_1.4a
GK19srngt_su:1270: sā bāḍhaṃ bhavatekṣiteti niviḍaṃ saṃyamya bāhvoḥ srajā ST_1.45ba
GK19srngt_su:1271: sāma dānaṃ ca bhedaḥ syād ST_2.42a
GK19srngt_su:1276: sārdhaṃ manoratha-śatais tava dhūrta kāntā ST_1.41ca
GK19srngt_su:1277: sārdhaṃ locana-vāriṇā vigalitaṃ yat prāktanaṃ me sukham ST_2.58bb
GK19srngt_su:1278: sā vāṇī jita-kāma-kārmuka-ravā saundaryam etasya tat ST_2.10ab
GK19srngt_su:1279: sā sātvatī nāma matātra vṛttiḥ ST_3.42d
GK19srngt_su:1281: sītāyāṃ rāmavat so'yam anukūlaḥ smṛto yathā ST_1.25b
GK19srngt_su:1289: supteyaṃ kila sundarīti subhagaḥ svairaṃ tathaivāsvaja- ST_1.40ac
GK19srngt_su:1290: subhaga kuravakas tvaṃ no kim āliṅganoktiḥ ST_1.39ca
GK19srngt_su:1291: subhaga bhagavatā hṛdye tasyā jvalat-smara-pāvake'py ST_2.67da
GK19srngt_su:1292: sumukhi vimukhī padme manye tavāsyapipāsayā ST_1.37ab
GK19srngt_su:1294: seyaṃ paraṅginī mṛṇāla-latikām ādāya yasyāḥ priyo ST_1.42aa
GK19srngt_su:1297: saivāsya praṇatis tad eva vacanaṃ tā eva keli-kriyā- ST_1.26aa
GK19srngt_su:1298: sotkaṇṭhaṃ ruditaṃ sakampam asakṛd yātaṃ sa-bāṣpaṃ ciraṃ ST_1.79aa
GK19srngt_su:1302: saugandhyaṃ malayānilena balinā tanvī vibhajyeti sā ST_2.60bc
GK19srngt_su:1304: saundaryaṃ śaśa-lāñchanasya kavibhir mithyaiva tad varṇyate ST_3.39aa
GK19srngt_su:1306: saubhāgyaṃ kva nu paṅkajasya rajanī-saṃbhoga-bhagna-tviṣaḥ ST_3.39ab
GK19srngt_su:1309: stat kenāsau sutanu jantio mānmathas te vikāraḥ ST_2.11ad
GK19srngt_su:1313: stribhuvana-jaye sā pañceṣoḥ karoti sahāyatām ST_1.42dd
GK19srngt_su:1314: strīṇām abhīṣṭas tv iha nāyakaḥ syāt ST_1.23d
GK19srngt_su:1315: strīṇāṃ kaṣṭam idaṃ kṛtaṃ sarasijaṃ karṇe na barhi-cchadam ST_3.3bb
GK19srngt_su:1322: snehaṃ vinā bhayaṃ na syān ST_2.53a
GK19srngt_su:1323: spṛṣṭā tena tatheti jāta-pulakā prāptā punar mohanam ST_1.42cd
GK19srngt_su:1329: sphurati yad idam uccair locanaṃ tanvi vāmaṃ ST_2.67ga
GK19srngt_su:1332: smerāntā viśada-cchade ca śayane dṛṣṭiḥ samāropitā ST_2.67bd
GK19srngt_su:1339: svacchandair maṇitaiś ca yatra raṇitaṃ nihnūyate nūpuram ST_1.42bb
GK19srngt_su:1347: svalpair eva dinair iyaṃ vara-tanuḥ kenāpi saṃśikṣitā ST_2.13ad
GK19srngt_su:1354: svāmin bhaṅgurayālakaṃ sa-tilakaṃ bhālaṃ vilāsin kuru ST_1.42ca
GK19srngt_su:1357: svedaḥ kiṃ nu ghanastani stana-taṭe muktā-phalānāṃ tulāṃ ST_2.35ac
GK19srngt_su:1361: sve harmye kula-kanyakeva labhate jātair guṇair gauravam ST_1.7b
GK19srngt_su:1368: hasteṣuḥ kusumāyudhasya lalitaṃ rāga-śriyo locanaṃ ST_3.39ba
GK19srngt_su:1369: haṃho mānasa kiṃ smarasy abhimatāḥ siddhyanti puṇyaiḥ kriyāḥ ST_1.22dd
GK19srngt_su:1370: hāraṃ me kurute payodhara-taṭe pratyagra-tārā-rucam ST_1.42ab
GK19srngt_su:1375: hitvā bhītibharaṃ nirasya ca nijaṃ saubhāgya-garvaṃ manāk ST_1.ab
GK19srngt_su:1376: huṃkāraḥ param eka eva vacana-sthāne sthitaḥ sāṃprataṃ ST_2.15ac
GK19srngt_su:1377: hṛdayam adhunā kiñcit kartuṃ mamānyad ihecchati ST_2.58ed
